phrases: Hey, apparently Koichi's family does not know, either.
They were talking about possibly calling the police.
So he is missing.
And since Yukako is not here, either...
I sort of feel responsible.
You do not think he is dead, do you?
Nah, I doubt she is gone that far yet.
She must be keeping him somewhere.
We need to find him, and fast.
This might end up being a life or death situation.
It will not open!
This is awful!
Q. What year did Columbus discover the new continent?
The answer is the lock's combination.
It was also a movie title, was not it?
But it looked really long, so I did not watch it.
I have almost got it...
Um...
JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
Diamond is Unbreakable
Episode 9 Yukako Yamagishi Falls in Love, Part 2
I washed your underwear and your pajama pants for you.
What is wrong?
I will not know if you do not say anything.
I-I am a first-year in high school...
This is just the worst.
This goes beyond being embarrassed.
I feel like an awful human being.
Please, stop this already.
You hate me now, do not you?
You think I am pathetic, do not you?
Just let me go home already.
What could you possibly like about me, after I peed my pants?
Oh, you poor thing, Koichi.
I must be tormenting your heart.
I am a bad girl.
Nothing I say does any good!
I-I can feel tears starting to well up...
First I wet my pants, and now I am getting wet with tears?
But Koichi...
After saying that you are an awful human being,
I can see something shining, something invigorating, deep in your eyes.
Like you still have a trump card hidden up your sleeve.
That is what I like about you.
I would love to see what that is.
And if it belongs to someone you love,
there is nothing wrong with even poop or snot, right?
It is strange that you would even worry.
I felt true bliss while I was washing your pants.
Look!
I am working on a chair that has electricity running through it.
I will make sure it is done by dinner study time.
I am thinking about making Italian for dinner.
I should go buy some olive oil.
Look forward to it.
H-Help me!
She is just getting worse!
I have to hurry and escape,
o-or she is seriously going to kill me!
But...
How am I going to escape?
Koichi's got Reverb, though.
With that thing, he can still call for help even if he is being gagged, right?
But Reverb's range is about 50 meters.
He might have been taken to a place where no one else lives nearby.
There are tons of places like that.
Wait!
She said she was going to buy some olive oil.
But I cannot imagine her going out shopping in this situation.
Is she going to order by phone, then?
Could it be...
There it is!
A pay phone!
48 meters!
Yes!
It is just within my range!
Reverb is a sound Stand!
Now I can signal Josuke for help.
I do not have any 10 yen coins!
I was wearing pajamas when I was brought here.
Should I dial 110?
But that woman might actually kill the police.
I am just going to have to contact Josuke somehow!
You were wondering if there was a pay phone nearby, were not you?
Y-Yukako...
I know exactly what you are thinking.
You heard me say that I was going to get some olive oil,
so there must be a pay phone nearby.
But even if you were to get to it, you do not have any 10 yen coins.
That is what you were thinking, right?
I-Is there a pay phone?
Hmph.
Playing dumb, I see.
You should abandon the idea of trying to call someone.
You will not be able to set foot outside of this house.
Just in case, I am going to go destroy the 110 button on the phone.
Is there anything that you would like?
N-No, not really...
Wh-What is wrong with her?!
I guess it is no use...
I cannot contact anyone...
Beep Boop Beep Boop Beep
What are these letters?
There is suddenly sound coming from my hand...
It is calling somewhere!
I have not even dialed the phone number yet.
Hello?
This is Higashikata.
It connected!
As long as the call sounds go through, calls on those phones will be connected.
Hello, is this Koichi?
Hey!
It is me, Josuke!
Koichi, where are you?
What?
I can hear the sound of waves...
Koichi, you...
You have a power like I do, do not you?
Yes!
Now Josuke will definitely come here!
It will only take 15 to 20 minutes by car.
I just have to survive until then!
N-No matter what!
The sound of waves...
A pay phone...
The place Koichi is...
It is got to be here!
Koichi.
Koichi!
She is coming back!
I-I have got no choice but to fight!
Open the door, Koichi.
Wh-Why do not you just break the door down?
If Josuke sees a broken door, he will definitely think something is wrong.
I am very happy right now.
I am so happy that you have powers like I do, Koichi.
Though it pisses me off that you were hiding that from me.
But I am still very happy.
Because the most important thing for a man and a woman living together
is love, and having the same goals and values, right?
We have something in common that no one else has.
We have the ultimate compatibility.
So please, Koichi...
Open the door.
I told you to open the door.
Hurry up and open the door!
I hate you
I hate you
I hate you!
I hate you!
I hate you!
I hate you!
I hate you!
Th-The ultimate compatibility?!
I hate you!
I hate you!
I hate you!
I hate you!
I hate you!
Cannot you tell how much I do not want to be here?!
That sound will not go away until you cry, apologize, and give up on me.
What is this?
I do not hear any of this.
I hate you
Huh?!
Th-This is...
nothing like that time with Tamami.
Her delusions are way too strong!
I had no idea sh-she would be this stubborn...
I finally found out that we have been bound by the one
and only red thread in this world.
Some people never find it at all.
Do not you understand how wonderful that is?
Koichi...
I was going to try to make you into a fine man,
but now things are different.
I will not let you leave this house until you fall in love with me.
I will make you love me!
Or else...
I might just kill you.
I cannot let her in here, no matter what...
I need to attack her with Reverb one more time!
If I try harder, I will be able to produce a louder sound than before.
Reverb!
Something is wrong with Reverb...
Reverb!
It is not moving!
D-Did it die?
Did my Stand die of utter despair?
Reverb is dead!
Re
Rev
Rever
Reverb
Ko
Koichi
Koichi Hiro
Koichi Hirose
N-No! M-My...
My Reverb is not moving at all!
Stands use mental ability to move.
I pushed it too far, and then it got too worked up and died!
My Reverb...
What?!
Wh-What is that?
It is called a Stand?
What is that Stand?
This shoe cabinet is in my way!
I-I am going to be killed!
If she comes in the door and catches me, then sooner or later, I will be killed!
Open up, Koichi!
Do not come through that door!
If only that door would blow her far away...
It is gone!
It is just an empty she will.
Where did you put it?
Huh?
I am asking what happened to the thing inside that!
Huh?!
Th...
That is...
Wh-What is this?
My Reverb
i-is not dead!
Did it emerge from its old she will into a new form?
What is this?
The design's only changed a little, and it shrank.
Just changing its shape will not make any difference!
I-It is fast!
Wh-What is
this wind?!
Bam
Sh-She got blown away!
I am not sure how, but she just got blown away by something like wind!
Wh-What just...
happened to me?
Reverb's letters are on the door...
Fwoosh
Fwoosh
Because she touched the door with these words on it, they became real.
Fwoosh
The sensation of Fwoosh actually blew her away.
Earlier, I wished this door would blow her away...
I guess I was unknowingly controlling it.
This is the new Reverb!
Reverb Act 2!
Koichi...
Teioh
It is those two...
If it is a place near the sea with a lot of uninhabited houses,
it has to be this area with all the villas.
But there are, like, dozens of villas around here.
We cannot tell which one it is.
We have to find the pay phone!
Koichi called us from one.
Let us find the pay phone first and then look at the houses near it.
Yeah.
Cute little Koichi belongs to me.
I will not let anyone else have him.
You probably should not come any closer, Yukako.
I can tell for myself
that you cannot beat my Reverb Act 2's abilities.
You will not be able to keep me here.
My left eyelid is starting to twitch.
Ever since I was little, my orbicularis oculi muscle would
start twitching when I got worked up,
and I would start to feel a bit violent.
Do not you get up on your high horse just because
you have obtained a slightly different ability!
I am going to have to get violent now!
Hot!
H-How dare you?!
My hand got burnt!
You little shit!
When you said you were going to get violent,
did you mean how you are talking right now?
How dare you do this to me?!
You are just a baby chick!
You belong to me!
You belong to me, but you dare defy me?!
Even though you belong to me?!
Reverb Act 2!
I missed?
Hey, Josuke.
I heard it.
That was the sound of something breaking.
Hey, I think it is that house.
T-To think that her hair would grow this much...
Her mental ability is too strong.
Mental ability that is completely black and vindictive...
Was yours called Reverb?
Now that I know what it does, it is not impressive at all.
I just need to make sure I do not touch those letters, right?
By the way, I will ask you one more time...
You love me, right?
Just try to say that you do not love me.
I will rip you and this house apart right here, right now.
If you die, you will be mine forever,
because you will live on in my heart as a memory forever.
Hurry up and answer me!
I am in this mess right now because
you would not understand when I told you.
I have been telling you that I do not like you
all this time.
I will kill you, Koichi!
Dogon
I have also already told you
that you will not be able to catch me.
You have touched the letters that will blow you away.
Those letters are on me, the one you called a little shit.
Her hair turned white!
She is not dead, is she?
She is alive!
Even though she is crazy and downright nasty,
I suppose I should be happy about this.
I was not able to catch you...
But I figured out that all I need to do is destroy your Stand!
Impudent brat!
Dumbass!
I-I cannot believe you can still attack...
Your mental ability is insane!
Shut up!
How dare you, you little pissy-pants?!
How dare you do this to me?!
My precious hair turned white,
you limp-dicked bastard!
I loved you!
But I cannot forgive you for doing this to my beautiful hair!
I do not care who you are!
I will not forgive you if you harm my beauty!
I am going to rip off this pissy-pants' little dick and pull out his organs along with it!
S-Stop...
Shut up!
You are going to end up like that, too, are not you?!
What?
What was that noise just now?
Let go of my Reverb and grab hold of something.
The cliff is going to crumble.
When Reverb heard the sound of your heart,
it also heard the sound of the ground cracking.
I have to let go of this thing and grab on to something!
Damn it!
I-I do not have... time!
Boingy-Boing
Boingy-Boing
It crumbled, just like I said, right?
But you do not understand anything I say, do you?
You mean you had written it there already?
When I was trying to rip Reverb apart...
You put those letters on that rock beneath the cliff?
You mean that while I was trying to kill Koichi,
he was already trying to think of how to save me?
I-I have lost completely.
No, I lost the moment I first saw Koichi.
Hey, Koichi!
Are you alive?
Are you all right, Koichi?!
Josuke!
Okuyasu!
Took you long enough to get here!
Jeez!
B-But I love him even more now.
I do not care if he completely ignores me.
I am happy just thinking
about you, Koichi!
Hey, look over there!
Is that Yukako?
Her hair's gone completely white!
Whoa, you are right.
But is not that chick smiling like she could not be any happier?
And she is looking right this way.
Huh?!
You are right.
That is creepy as hell.
Let us get outta here!
Save me, Josuke!
Do not depend on me!
Well, I will be damned.
Did you see that, Masaji?
I are not drunk, Gramps!
Morioh Landmark 2 Cape Boingy-Boing Directions: Ask one of the local fishermen, Where is Cape Boingy-Boing?
They will kindly take you there by boat.
Boingy-Boing Cape.
It seems it grew famous due to a rumor
that some fishermen saw a young girl try to kill herself,
only for a rock in the cape to go boingy-boing and gently fling her back.
Hirose!
You worked really hard on this exam.
You can do it if you try.
English Exam Answer Sheet
Test 3 Koichi Hirose
I do not...
know how I should feel about this.
Episode 10 Let us Go Eat Some Italian Food
Episode 10 Let us Go Eat Some Italian Food
